ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisAppointment of CURTIS CLARKE of Spruce Grove, Alberta, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
